title: Snow blizzard kills 4, brings much of Spain to a standstill
content:
1. Snow blizzard kills 4, brings much of Spain to a standstill  The Associated Press
  2. Madrid sees heaviest snowfall in 50 years as storms snarl travel in Spain  FRANCE 24 English
  3. Storm Filomena: Spain sees 'exceptional' snowfall  BBC News
  4. Spain blanketed in heavy snow as record-breaking blizzard brings Madrid to standstill  The Telegraph
  5. Two die in Spanish storm, troops deployed to help motorists stranded by snow  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
